overview:
The International Institute for Procurement and Market Research (IIPMR) was found in 2008 as a consulting firm offering solutions to clients in Supply Chain Management and Market Research.

Over the course of time, IIPMR started offering online certification courses in Supply Chain Management and Market Research. During October 2012, IIPMR was rated as the world’s largest Market Research Training Institute by Market Research Experts, a popular research agency based out of India.

In its latest press release IIPMR boasts of having members from over 54 countries who have enrolled for its online supply chain certifications. The Certified Research Expert Certification abbreviated as CRE is supposedly the most highly respected market research certification as of today.

IIPMR members consist of CEOs, Directors, Vice Presidents, Senior Managers, Analysts, Principals, Consultants from leading companies such as IBM, Accenture, Infosys, Bayer, Flextonics, Frost & Sullivan, Genpact, etc
